Event.MetaDescription: Come and enjoy Rasikalaya Carnatic event on 5th Feb 2011 at Ealing
Event.Address: Church of the Ascension Hall, Beaufort Road, Ealing W5 3EB
Event.Maindescription:
Rasikalaya kicks off the new year with a grand vocal concert by vidushi Smt Sangeetha Swaminathan.

Please mark your calendars accordingly.

Concert details:

Smt Sangeetha Swaminathan (vocal)
Dr Jyotsna Srikanth (violin)
Sri Somasundara Desigar (mridangam)

For tickets e-mail rasikalaya@gmail.com

]]>
